entry.title: Rust Basel Association Annual Meeting 2025
entry.content:
Rust Basel Association Annual Meeting

On April 8th 2025 the Rust Basel Association had its founding meeting as a formal association. This was done to enable the association to open a bank account, collect sponsorship and use those funds to organise talks, workshops and events.

As a formal association we are required to hold annual meetings to handle certain administrative responsibilities. This meeting is open for all to attend, but only registered members will be able to vote. We are not accepting membership applications prior to the meeting (as members need to be notified 30 days before the meeting) but are happy to accept applications afterwards.

  • Date and Time: Thursday, 04.12.2025 19:00
  • Location: Markthalle Basel
  • Agenda:
    • Approval of minutes of last general meeting (founding meeting)
    • Review previous year's report and budget
    • Approve next years budget
    • Appoint new board of the association
    • Approve changes to the statutes

More details will appear closer to the event on our discord.
